content: I'd like to merge rust-lang/wg-async-foundations #68 -- any seconds? :)

I like the proposal in general, but as I noted in the PR, I think it would be good to try to abstract a tiny bit more and mention block_on as an example instead of implying that fixing that fixes all of their issues.
second, we can address the specificity question during collation
@rylev oh, I missed your comments. I do think the block_on could be improved a bit as well, though I'm not inclined to block.
I was curious how you felt about this edit
Looks good. I might eventually take a stab at editing the morals section to ensure the story is well understood as being generally applicable
